name: Fenbol
description:
Challenge your friends to one on one football action! Use a variety of tactics to outmaneuver your opponent and score. Almost every setting from game speed to ball bounciness is customizable. Currently the project is in Alpha v0.3.1 and you can see the road map at: https://trello.com/b/jyglkQpS/fenbol.

How to Play:

WASD + Space for the Red player

Arrows + Enter for the Blue Player

Esc to Pause
